entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Prince Rupert
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:12 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince Rupert Airport 7:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.3°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -6.5°C
Wind: ESE 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to a few rain showers and flurries in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h except northeast 40 gusting to 60 through mainland inlets and valleys in the morning. Wind becoming light in the morning. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023
